unspecified cards

DESCRIPTIONS: You only take
% of the damage recieved. After you play an attack card, decrease the damage received by 1%. (Minimum 50%)

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, add

DESCRIPTIONS: Lightning hits all enemies. If there is only one enemy, Lightning will hit
times.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, add

LonelyPower.NAME: Forever Alone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, deal 666 damage to yourself if you are alone in the room.

NineLifeCatPower.NAME: Nine-Life Cat
DESCRIPTIONS: Nine-life cats: "Meow~ you still have
lifes."

PowerDownPower.NAME: Exhaustion
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of every 3 turns, lose 1 of all buffs you have. (Defect is immune for some of the buffs.)

ShuaLaiPower.NAME: Lose Target
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent 50% of the time this enemy would recieve damage.

GuppysCollarPower.NAME: Guppys Collar
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, heal to 1 HP with 60% of chance.

times the damage after lose block
